definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather

sentences.english: Drilling-and-blasting operations is the most spectacular part of the extraction process.
sentences.chinese: 鑽孔爆破作業是採掘過程中最驚人的。

sentences.english: Part five is standard design of financial reporting in extractive coal industry .
sentences.chinese: 第五部分爲煤炭採掘業財務報告準則設計。

sentences.english: Part six is case analysis of financial reporting in extractive coal industry .
sentences.chinese: 第六部分爲煤炭採掘業財務報告案例分析。

sentences.english: Excavators work with illumination at night.
sentences.chinese: 晚上採掘機在光照下進行作業。

sentences.english: Open pit mining production scheduling is of guidance significance to the mine construction and balanced production.
sentences.chinese: 採掘進度計劃對礦山建設和均衡生產具有指導作用。

sentences.english: We are moving away from dependence on extractive industries and agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在擺脫對採掘業和農業的依賴。

sentences.english: Some of the world's supply of salt is mined as rock salt.
sentences.chinese: 世界上有些鹽的供應靠採掘岩鹽。

sentences.english: The paper introduces various kinds of methods on repairing damaged thead holes of mining and developing equipment in coalmines.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了煤礦採掘設備破損螺紋孔的多種修理方法。

sentences.english: The Ancient Tonglu Mountain Copper Mining adopted heavy-mineral measuring technology to determine the direction of digging.
sentences.chinese: 銅綠山古礦井採用重砂測量的方法確定採掘方向。

sentences.english: N - Agriculture, Natural Resources, Environment, and Extractive Industries.
sentences.chinese: 農業，自然資源，環境，採掘業。

definition: China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, Sinopec
